text: “Ndipo (kumbukira) pamene tidamkhazika Ibrahim (ndi kumlondolera) pamalo pa Nyumba (yopatulikayo; tidamuuza kuti): “Usandiphatikize ndi chilichonse; ndipo iyeretse nyumba yanga chifukwa cha amene akuizungulira ndi kumakhala pompo (pochita mapemphero awo); ndi omwe amawerama ndi kugwetsa nkhope zawo pansi
